name: Lipoid Kosmetik - Lamellar Systems & Phospholipids
description: Lipoid Kosmetik AG is a Swiss specialist in phospholipids and lamellar systems for cosmetic applications. Their SLM Skin Lipid Matrix® technology maintains and restores the skin's natural protective barrier through three-dimensional lamellar networks. The company offers Natipide® Eco for liposomal encapsulation and various phospholipid-based delivery systems that support barrier recovery.
products: SLM Skin Lipid Matrix® (Lamellar barrier system)
Vitamin F watersoluble N (Essential fatty acids)
notes: Swiss quality phospholipid specialist with proprietary SLM Skin Lipid Matrix® technology. Lamellar arrangement of lipids effectively supports skin barrier recovery. Natipide® Eco is an innovative carrier system for hydrophilic actives. Extensive technical support available.
